name: aggronite
effect: Held: Allows Aggron to Mega Evolve into Mega Aggron.
short_effect: Held: Allows Aggron to Mega Evolve into Mega Aggron.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Aggron hold it, and this stone will
enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
